text: Parviz Davoodi (; 5 February 1952 - 18 April 2024) was an Iranian politician. He was the first Vice President of Iran from 2005 until 2009. Davoodi died in Tehran on 18 April 2024, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Iran Category:Politicians from Tehran
title: Parviz Davoodi
